solution_list2<-as.character(solution_list)
pick_solution2<- function(x){
  z<-str_split(x, " ")[[1]] 
  y<-stri_length(z)
  my.data<-cbind(z,y)
  my.data2<- as.data.frame(my.data)
  my.data2%>% 
  filter(y=="5")
  print(x)
}
